description:
At gamescom 2024, Lucy and Tam finally went hands on with the open-world survival MMO Dune: Awakening, and found that the game has faithfully recreated the harsh reality of life on the desert planet.

#gaming #DuneAwakening #gamespot
title: Dune: Awakening Nails The Struggle To Survive On Arrakis | gamescom 2024

title: We PLAYED Dune: Awakening

description:
What are Kurts thoughts on Avowed?
Full video: https://youtu.be/Dmkv2vL7Qq0
title: Our "Obsidian" impression of Avowed!

description:
Obsidian's upcoming Avowed is mixing up what a fantasy action game can be. At Gamescom 2024, Kurt Indovina got to spend some time playing with both the mage and ranger classes, weaving together Doom-like spell-casting, fantasy gunslinging, with Obsidian's style, charm, and humor. 

Avowed releases on February 18th 2025

#gaming #avowed #gamespot
title: Avowed Refreshes The Fantasy Action Genre | GameSpot Preview | gamescom 2024

description:
Check out this quick 2 minute gameplay clip of Mouse: P.I. Fore Hire from Fumi Games that was showed off at gamescom 2024.

**Please note that the SFX, Music, Gameplay and everything else is currently a work in progress and gameplay doesn't reflect the final game.

#mousepiforhire #gamescom #gaming
title: Mouse: P.I. For Hire Gameplay | gamescom 2024

description:

Pre-order and get Open Beta Early Access starting August 30
title: Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 - "Liberty Falls" | Zombies Cinematic Trailer

description:
Check out a live gameplay demo of Avowed from the developers at Obsidian Entertainment the Xbox @ gamescom 2024 showcase. We get to see a full playthrough of a quest in the game.

#avowed #xbox #gaming
title: 31 Minutes of Avowed Live Gameplay Demo | gamescom 2024

description:
Learn more about the upcoming Warhammer 40k: Space Marine 2 with Tim Willits Chief Creative Officer at Saber Interactive. Learn more about the game coming out September 9th, 2024 during this xbox @ gamescom 2024 live segment.

#warhammer40k #xbox #gaming
title: Warhammer 40k: Space Marine 2 Gameplay Overview | gamescom 2024

description:
A man who once survived the Emissions, turned the tides of the faction wars, and witnessed the rise of Clear Sky! Now, he stands nearly alone against the oppression of free Stalkers. Could there ever be a better guide to the Shining Side of the Zone, where eternal spring and a new home await us?
The chance to ignite the Spark is near.
title: S.T.A.L.K.E.R. 2: Heart of Chornobyl — Scar Character Introduction Trailer | gamescom 2024

description:
Learn more about what you can expect to see and play in Indiana Jones and the Great Circle in this gameplay overview with the devs. They share more insight on the game coming December 9th, 2024. 

#indianajonesandthegreatcircle #xbox #gaming
title: Indiana Jones and The Great Circle Gameplay Overview | gamescom 2024

description:
Feel the brutality of the Plasma Incinerator! 

Make good use of this powerful weapon to break through the most heavily armoured units.

#SpaceMarine2 releases on September 9, on PS5, Xbox Series X|S and PC.
title: Warhammer 40k: Space Marine 2 - Plasma Incinerator Weapon Gameplay Trailer

description:
The season of change!

Tiffany Wat and Rod Fergusson of Blizzard joins us for a chat about the community, balance changes, and jokes about a Paladin.

Timestamps:
00:00 How much of the campaign do you need to complete before you can get into Vessel of Hatred? 
01:43 What is the process of choosing whether or not to the previous season mechanics were added to the core game?
06:27 What are the big points of feedback that the team is looking for to address once Vessel of Hatred is out?
08:19 What's the reception been like? You know, seeing a sort of split
between the excitement of a new class, a desire for their old favorites.
11:02 What's the cadence of expansions?
11:45 What was the goal behind the new dungeon activity?

#diablo #diablo4 #gamespot
title: Diablo 4 Devs Talk Vessel of Hatred, Spiritborn, Seasonal Changes and Community Feedback

description:
At Gamescom 2024 Jan and Bailey played through a few stages of Power Rangers: Rita's Rewind, the 5-player beat-em-up game that is packed with treats for any Power Rangers nerd. Expect throwback action in the vein of TMNT: Shredder's Revenge, and more Megazords than you can shake Rita Replusa's magic wand at.

#gaming #powerrangersritasrewind #gamespot
title: Power Rangers: Rita's Rewind Is A Beat-Em-Up Treat | Gamescom 2024
